text.autoconfig.rendi.option.iFrameInter: How many ticks of i-frames does an entity get when damaged, from 0 (default), to 2^31-1 (nothing can take damage)
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.excludePlay: Are players excluded from this mod (if true, players will always get 10 ticks of i-frames on being damaged
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.excludeAllM: Are mobs excluded from this mod (if true, mobs will always get 10 ticks of i-frames on being damaged
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.attackCance: How weak a player's attack can be before it gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, players cannot attack), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.knockbackCa: How weak a player's attack can be before the knockback gets nullified, from 0 (0%, cancels multiple attacks on the same tick) to 1 (100%, no knockback), or -0.1 (disables this feature)
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.attackExclu: List of entities that need to give i-frames on attacking
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.dmgReceiveE: List of entities that need to receive i-frames on receiving attacks or relies on i-frames
text.autoconfig.rendi.option.damageSrcWh: List of damage sources that need to give i-frames on doing damage (ex: lava)
